abstract: Though sartorial selections differ, the frenzy in Bhutan surrounding the wedding of the king has rivaled - at least locally - that in Britain during the April nuptials of Prince William and Kate Middleton.
snippet: Though sartorial selections differ, the frenzy in Bhutan surrounding the wedding of the king has rivaled - at least locally - that in Britain during the April nuptials of Prince William and Kate Middleton.
lead_paragraph: A royal wedding is on, but there is nary a fascinator in sight.

headline.main: Fewer Fancy Hats, But Plenty of Pomp at Bhutan's Royal Wedding
